\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, New York City Department of City Planning, filed an application pursuant to Sections 197-c and 199 of the New York City Charter for an amendment to the City Map involving:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\qj 1)\tab the establishment of Park within the area bounded by Huntington Street, Smith Street, Nelson Street, Hoyt Street, 4\super th\nosupersub  Street, Bond Street and The Gowanus Canal;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li1080\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\qj 2)\tab the adjustment of grades and block dimensions necessitated thereby; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
including authorization for any acquisition or disposition of real property related thereto, in accordance with Map Nos. X-2755 and X-2756 dated December 7, 2020 and signed by the Borough President, which in conjunction with the related actions would facilitate land use changes for 82 full or partial blocks in the Gowanus neighborhood of Brooklyn, Community Districts 2 and 6 (ULURP No. C 210180 MMK) (the \ldblquote Application\rdblquote );\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\cf1\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 24, 2021 its decision dated September 22, 2021 (the "Decision"), on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\cf0 WHEREAS, the Application is related to applications\f1  \f0 C 210177 ZMK (L.U. No. 869), an amendment to the Zoning Map to change R6, R6B, R8A, R8A/C2-4, C8-2, M1-1, M1-2, M2-1, and M3-1 districts to R6B, R6A, M1-4/R6B, M1-4/R6A, M1-4/R7A, M1-4/R7-2, M1-4/R7X, C4-4D, and M1-4 districts, eliminate commercial overlays, establish the Special Gowanus Mixed Use District, and replace a Special Enhanced Commercial District (EC-1); N 210178 ZRK (L.U. No. 870), a zoning text amendment to establish the Special Gowanus Mixed-Use District, Gowanus Waterfront Access Plan, establish a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area, and replace the EC-1 within the rezoning area; C 210179 MMK (L.U. No. 871), a the establishment of streets, the elimination of street segments, and removal of a \ldblquote Public Place\rdblquote  designation; C 210053 PPK (L.U. No. 873), a disposition of City-owned property; and C 210052 HAK (L.U. No. 874), a disposition approval, UDAA and UDAAP designation;\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi180\li-180\qj\f2\fs22\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\ri144\qj\f0\fs24 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on October 12, 2021;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Positive Declaration issued March 22\super nd\nosupersub , 2019 (CEQR No. 19DCP157K) and a Final Environmental Impact Statement (FEIS) for which a Notice of Completion was issued on September 10, 2021, which identified significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise, which would be avoided through the placement of (E) designations (E-601) on selected projected and potential development sites; and significant adverse impacts with respect to community facilities (publicly funded child care services), active open space, shadows (Douglass & Degraw Pool and Our Lady of Peace stained glass windows), historic and cultural resources (architectural and archaeological), transportation (traffic, transit, and pedestrians), air quality (mobile source), and construction activities related to noise and historic and cultural resources; and the proposed mitigation measures summarized in Chapter 21, Mitigation, of the FEIS, and the Technical Memoranda dated September 21, 2021 and November 16, 2021 (the \ldblquote Technical Memoranda\rdblquote ).\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\f1\tab\f0 Having considered the FEIS and Technical Memoranda with respect to the Decision and Application, the Council finds that:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720  \tab\par
(1)\tab The FEIS meets the requirements of 6 N.Y.C.R.R. Part 617; \par
\par
(2)\tab The environmental impacts disclosed in the FEIS were evaluated in relation to the social, economic, and other considerations associated with the actions that are set forth in this report; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 (3)\tab Consistent with social, economic and other essential considerations from among the reasonable alternatives available, the action is one which avoids or minimizes adverse environmental impacts to the maximum extent practicable;\f1\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab\f0 The Decision, together with the FEIS and Technical Memoranda constitute the written statement of facts, and of social, economic and other factors and standards that form the basis of this determination, pursuant to 6 N.Y.C.R.R. \'a7617.11(d).\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 199 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 210180 MMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision for an amendment to the City Map involving: \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj 1)\tab the establishment of Park within the area bounded by Huntington Street, Smith Street, Nelson Street, Hoyt Street, 4\super th\nosupersub  Street, Bond Street and The Gowanus Canal;\par
\par
2)\tab the adjustment of grades and block dimensions necessitated thereby; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
including authorization for any acquisition or disposition of real property related thereto, in accordance with Map Nos. X-2755 and X-2756 dated December 7, 2020 and signed by the Borough President.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri127 All such approvals being subject to the following conditions: \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri130\qj a.\tab The subject amendment to the City Map shall take effect on the day following the day on which certified counterparts of Map No. X-2755 and X-2756 dated December 7, 2020 are filed with the appropriate agencies in accordance with Section 198 subsection c of the New York City Charter.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li1440\ri130\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 Adopted.\par
